title: MSBuild running on coreclr
body:
As per request from the coreclr people, moving over discussion to here from https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/issues/497

What is needed for getting MSBuild running on coreclr?

nodes.body:
I presume that the Xplat work will also be the branch for "run on coreclr". I see the branch here: https://github.com/microsoft/msbuild/tree/xplat

What's the general status? Are there items that interested parties can tackle? Is a plan still being formulate? So many questions. :-)
Ultimately we do want MSBuild to run on Core CLR, but we are not currently working on that. We would accept contributions towards this goal in the xplat branch.

We are in the process porting MSBuild to .NET Core (see [this blog post](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/dotnet/archive/2015/09/03/msbuild-is-going-cross-platform-with-net-core.aspx)), but this work item isn't useful to track the work (it's too broad) so I'm closing it.
